# Screenshots Directory

Add your screenshot images to this directory. The carousel on the Home page will automatically display them.

## Supported Formats
- PNG (recommended)
- JPG/JPEG
- WebP

## Naming Convention
Name your screenshots as:
- `screenshot1.png`
- `screenshot2.png`
- `screenshot3.png`
- `screenshot4.png`

Or update the `screenshots` array in `src/pages/Home.tsx` to match your file names.

## Image Recommendations
- Recommended size: 1920x1080 or similar 16:9 aspect ratio
- File size: Keep under 500KB per image for faster loading
- Format: PNG for screenshots with text, JPG for photos

## Current Screenshots
The carousel is configured to show 4 screenshots:
1. Dashboard Overview
2. Network Monitoring
3. Device Management
4. System Metrics

You can add more screenshots by updating the `screenshots` array in `src/pages/Home.tsx`.
